name: elop
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, cop(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))
-| wcel(c1, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)

comment: Characterization of the elements of an ordered pair. Exercise 3 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) Remove an extraneous hypothesis. (Revised by BJ, 25-Dec-2020.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
